meaning_str.bing:
v. 乞讨；恳求；祈求；行乞
网络. 乞求；请求；贝尔格莱德(Belgrade)

恳求；请求；乞求；祈求；恳请；诉求；乞讨；行乞；乞求施舍；哀求；寻求帮助；求得；索要；正式请求；以乞讨为生

1.en: I pity those who beg, and if they do not ignore the existence of time, then would not the outcome of this tragic fall.
1.cn: 我怜惜那些乞讨者，如果他们不忽视了光阴的存在，那么就不会落下这个悲惨的结局。

2.en: "Our family is very poor, " said Niaz Mohammad, a nine-year-old who said he used to help his father beg.
2.cn: “我们家很穷”，9岁男孩尼亚孜·穆罕默德（NiazMohammad）说，他一直帮着他父亲乞讨。

3.en: He said he would starve rather than beg for food.
3.cn: 他说他宁愿挨饿也不要饭吃。

0.en: They beg for scraps, like poor Agathe. This is our world, Belle. For simple folk like us, it doesn't getting better.
0.cn: 会像阿加特那样靠乞讨为生。这就是现实，贝儿。像我们这穷乡僻壤的，还有什么可挑的。

4.en: Please escort Mr. Turing from the premises. No. I beg your pardon?
4.cn: 请护送图灵先生离开。不。再说一遍？

5.en: Chuck, no. No, no, no. There's no more room in here. I beg you, please!
5.cn: 查克，不行，这里已经没有空地了，我求你了，拜托！

6.en: What are you doing here? I can't believe I have to beg you to go shopping.
6.cn: 你在这干嘛？不敢相信我得求你去购物。

7.en: I beg your pardon? I mean in the eyes. Oh, good. Because she's fairly round.
7.cn: 你说什么呢？我是说眼睛很像。噢，那太好了，因为她有一点圆润。

8.en: Yeah. You know what? I know what you mean, I do that too. I beg your pardon?
8.cn: 我懂你的意思，我也有同感。你说什么？

9.en: Please. I'm not as bad as Ross. Oh, I beg to differ. The Pictionary incident?
9.cn: 拜托我没像罗斯那么烂。我抗议，画图猜字事件呢？

10.en: Hello, Peppa. Hello, George. I beg your pardon? Peppa, I was just saying ''hello''.
10.cn: 你好，佩佩。你好，乔治。你说什么？佩佩，我只是在说“你好”。

11.en: And I beg forgiveness if I, at all, overstepped at the parley. It was your hour, not mine.
11.cn: 如果我在谈判时有越界之嫌，还请王子见谅，那是属于你的时刻，不是我的。

12.en: I beg your pardon, Your Ladyship. No. Don't apologize. I'm glad to have an ally in the room.
12.cn: 对不起打扰您，老夫人。不用道歉。我倒希望有个人能帮帮腔。

13.en: Every advisor and consultant and staff member would beg a presidential candidate not to say them.
13.cn: 每一个幕僚，顾问和下属都不希望总统候选人说这种话。

14.en: I'm not here to extradite anyone. See, he's gonna come voluntarily. As a matter of fact, he's gonna beg me.
14.cn: 我不是来这抓人的，听着，他自己会来找我的，事实上他会来求我。

15.en: When you've killed all your own birds, Mr Bingley, I beg you will come here and shoot as many as you please.
15.cn: 等你把你自己庄园里的鸟儿打完以后，请到班纳特老爷的庄园里来，你爱打多少就打多少。

16.en: At suppertime, Mr. Dinosaur sits next to George. I beg your pardon. Was that you George, or was it Mr. Dinosaur?
16.cn: 吃晚饭的时候，恐龙先生坐在乔治身边。这是谁发出的声音。是你吗，乔治，还是恐龙先生？恐龙。

17.en: Mummy is working on her computer. Hello, Peppa. Hello, George. I beg your pardon? Peppa, I was just saying ''hello''.
17.cn: 猪妈妈正在用电脑工作呢。你好佩琪，你好啊乔治。不好意思，我没听清。佩琪，我在和你打招呼。

18.en: Mummy is working on her computer. Hello, Peppa. Hello, George. I beg your pardon? Peppa, I was just saying ''hello''.
18.cn: 猪妈妈正在用电脑工作呢。你好佩奇，你好啊乔治。不好意思，我没听清。佩奇，我在和你打招呼。

19.en: If there's a picture of his wife and his kids and his dogs and his horses all in matching pajamas, I beg you to burn it.
19.cn: 如果里面有他跟他老婆孩子还有他家的狗与马全部穿成套睡衣的照片，我求你烧了它。
